layman_description: Classic bolt-action rifle for long-range precision hunting.
technical_description: Ranged weapon with high damage per shot, low fire rate, and scope capability.
player_impact: Essential for dealing sustained single-shot damage at distance in combat.

layman_description: Ammunition for the hunting rifle stored in your inventory.
technical_description: Consumable ammo type matching weaponRifleHuntingRifle with ballistic properties.
player_impact: Required to fire hunting rifles; carrying more extends engagement distance.

layman_description: Adds a small scope to your rifle for better aiming accuracy.
technical_description: Weapon attachment that increases zoom magnification and sight precision.
player_impact: Improves headshot accuracy and critical hit chances at range.

layman_description: Adds a medium-range scope to firearms for mid-distance targets.
technical_description: Weapon attachment providing balanced magnification for medium engagement ranges.
player_impact: Extends effective range while maintaining field of view awareness.

layman_description: Adds a powerful long-range scope for distant targets.
technical_description: High-magnification scope attachment limiting peripheral vision but enhancing distance engagement.
player_impact: Enables precision sniping at extreme ranges with maximum accuracy bonuses.

layman_description: Reduces recoil when you fire your weapon.
technical_description: Muzzle attachment that dampens weapon recoil and improves handling stability.
player_impact: Allows faster follow-up shots and better spray control in combat.

layman_description: Quiets your weapon shots to avoid alerting nearby zombies.
technical_description: Audio suppression attachment reducing gunshot noise propagation distance.
player_impact: Critical for stealth gameplay; prevents distant zombie aggro from shots.

layman_description: Adds a laser dot to your weapon for hip-firing accuracy.
technical_description: Sight attachment providing crosshair projection for unsighted fire accuracy bonus.
player_impact: Improves accuracy when firing without aiming, essential for close quarters.

layman_description: Mounts a flashlight to your weapon for dark areas.
technical_description: Light attachment integrated to weapon, providing localized illumination during combat.
player_impact: Essential for exploring dark buildings and identifying threats in shadows.

layman_description: Adds a red-dot sight to your weapon for fast target acquisition.
technical_description: Quick-aim sight attachment reducing aiming time without magnification penalty.
player_impact: Speeds up combat engagement while maintaining peripheral vision.

layman_description: Modifies gun to fire one shot per trigger pull.
technical_description: Trigger mechanism attachment limiting fire mode to single-shot operation.
player_impact: Improves accuracy and ammo efficiency but reduces damage output per second.

layman_description: Modifies gun to fire fully automatic.
technical_description: Trigger mechanism enabling full-auto fire mode with burst or sustained output.
player_impact: Maximizes close-range damage per second but increases recoil and ammo consumption.

layman_description: Heavy tool for mining resources from rocks and stone.
technical_description: Melee harvesting tool with high block damage and resource extraction efficiency.
player_impact: Required for efficient mining and resource gathering in caves and quarries.

layman_description: Versatile tool for cutting wood and harvesting trees.
technical_description: Melee harvesting tool optimized for organic materials like wood and plants.
player_impact: Primary tool for collecting building materials and fuel wood.

layman_description: Tool for digging dirt, sand, and buried resources.
technical_description: Melee digging implement with efficiency bonuses for soil and sand harvesting.
player_impact: Essential for excavation, foundation building, and earth manipulation.

layman_description: Blunt force tool for demolition and block upgrades.
technical_description: Melee tool with high impact force for structure upgrade and demolition actions.
player_impact: Necessary for upgrading and downgrading blocks during base construction.

layman_description: Stone axe for basic tool repair and harvesting.
technical_description: Early-tier repair tool usable for early game maintenance operations.
player_impact: Your first repair option for tool maintenance before better tools arrive.

layman_description: Iron repair kit for fixing damaged equipment mid-game.
technical_description: Mid-tier repair item restoring durability to weapons and tools.
player_impact: Keeps your gear functional longer during longer expeditions without returning home.

layman_description: Basic melee weapon made from stone for starting combat.
technical_description: Early-game melee spear with moderate damage and reach advantage.
player_impact: Your first viable melee weapon with reach advantage for early exploration.

layman_description: Heavy sledgehammer for devastating melee damage.
technical_description: High-damage melee weapon with slower swing speed but crushing impact force.
player_impact: One-hit eliminator for early zombies; essential for crowd control.

layman_description: Ranged weapon firing arrows silently for stealth kills.
technical_description: Silent ranged weapon with infinite ammo potential if arrows are recovered.
player_impact: Perfect for stealthy zombie elimination without triggering horde responses.

layman_description: Basic stone arrows for your bow in your inventory.
technical_description: Craftable projectile ammunition with low durability but high recovery rate.
player_impact: Cheap ammo option allowing silent long-range combat without finite resources.

layman_description: Explosive arrows that detonate on impact for area damage.
technical_description: Specialty ammunition with blast radius dealing area damage on hit.
player_impact: Clears groups of zombies with splash damage from single shots.

layman_description: Throwable incendiary bottle spreading fire across areas.
technical_description: Throwable weapon creating persistent fire damage zone on impact.
player_impact: Area denial tool stopping zombie advances and lighting dark areas.

layman_description: Explosive device throwing to deal blast damage and clear areas.
technical_description: Throwable ordnance with timed or impact detonation causing area damage.
player_impact: Mass zombie elimination tool for dealing with hordes efficiently.

layman_description: Gas grenade that stuns zombies temporarily when it explodes.
technical_description: Non-lethal ordnance creating incapacitation zone with debuff application.
player_impact: Crowd control tool separating zombies for tactical redeployment.

layman_description: Raw chicken meat filling hunger in your inventory.
technical_description: Food item providing base hunger restoration with sickness risk if raw.
player_impact: Quick hunger restoration but risk of food poisoning unless cooked.

layman_description: Raw beef steak for cooking into nutrition.
technical_description: Protein food source restoring significant hunger when cooked.
player_impact: High-value nutrition when prepared properly in campfire or oven.

layman_description: Chicken eggs providing versatile nutrition.
technical_description: Ingredient food item usable raw or cooked with varying benefits.
player_impact: Renewable food source from chicken farms; good for recipes and nutrition.

layman_description: Nuka Cola drink restoring hydration and giving slight buff.
technical_description: Beverage providing hydration restore and temporary stat buff application.
player_impact: Morale and survival booster when inventory space allows.

layman_description: Medical supply restoring health when used.
technical_description: Medical item providing health restoration for injury recovery.
player_impact: Essential for post-combat survival during extended expeditions.

layman_description: Cloth bandage for basic wound treatment.
technical_description: Basic medical item providing minor health restoration and bleeding stop.
player_impact: Early-game health recovery option before better medicines available.

layman_description: Medicine preventing and curing infections.
technical_description: Medical item curing or preventing infection status effects.
player_impact: Essential for managing infection risk from zombie bites.

layman_description: Poison antidote curing toxin effects.
technical_description: Medical item curing poison and toxic debuff statuses.
player_impact: Protection against poison damage from certain zombies and traps.

layman_description: Plant material collected from plants and trees.
technical_description: Resource material usable in basic crafting and rope production.
player_impact: Foundational crafting material for early-game items.

layman_description: Wood logs from harvested trees in your inventory.
technical_description: Primary building and fuel material with multiple crafting uses.
player_impact: Essential for construction, fuel, and crafting throughout the game.

layman_description: Stone blocks from mining for basic construction.
technical_description: Primary defensive building material with high durability.
player_impact: Upgrading frames into stone blocks for improved base protection.

layman_description: Rough stone pieces for basic building.
technical_description: Early-game building material with lower durability than stone.
player_impact: Initial defensive structure material before accessing better options.

layman_description: Cement compound for crafting concrete blocks.
technical_description: Crafting ingredient producing reinforced concrete building material.
player_impact: Required for upgrading blocks into concrete for improved horde defense.

layman_description: Smelted iron bars for tool and weapon crafting.
technical_description: Processed metal material enabling mid-tier tool and weapon recipes.

layman_description: Steel alloy for high-grade weapons and tools.
technical_description: Highest-tier metal material enabling late-game equipment crafting.
player_impact: Required for top-tier weapons and tools in end-game.

layman_description: Metal pipes useful for crafting and building.
technical_description: Metal component material for complex device and weapon recipes.
player_impact: Building component for traps and electrical devices.

layman_description: Reclaimed iron scraps from looted items.
technical_description: Byproduct smelting material contributing to iron bar production.
player_impact: Supplement to mining for iron through recycling loot.

layman_description: Plastic waste useful for chemistry and crafting.
technical_description: Chemical material enabling polymer-dependent recipes.
player_impact: Essential for ammunition and chemical recipes.

layman_description: Lead metal collected from battery recycling.

layman_description: Raw copper ore from mining deposits.
technical_description: Metal ore requiring smelting for copper bar production.

layman_description: Fabric pieces for clothing and item crafting.
technical_description: Textile material enabling armor and clothing recipes.
player_impact: Base material for all armor and gear equipment.

layman_description: Hide material from butchered animals.
technical_description: Organic armor material with moderate protection properties.

layman_description: Bone material from deceased creatures.

player_impact: Early-game weapon and tool option from animal harvesting.

layman_description: Feathers from birds for padding and crafting.
technical_description: Light material for pillow and soft armor recipes.

layman_description: Vegetable crop providing good nutrition when cooked.
technical_description: Farmable ingredient with high carbohydrate nutrition value.
